revised_title: A Study of the Osteology and Dermal Armor of Glyptodon clavipes
tldr: This article by Thomas H. Huxley examines the osteology and dermal armor of the Glyptodon clavipes, a prehistoric armadillo-like creature. Huxley compares the fossil remains with those of living armadillos, providing insights into the structure and evolution of this extinct species.
